Module com.lmax.solana4j.client
Package com.lmax.solana4j.client.api

Interface AccountInfo

  • public interface AccountInfo
    Represents the information of an account on the Solana blockchain. This interface provides access to key properties of a Solana account, such as its balance, owner, data, and status.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  AccountInfo.AccountInfoData
      Represents account information data in a Solana transaction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AccountInfo.AccountInfoData getData()
      Retrieves the data associated with the account.
      long getLamports()
      Returns the number of lamports in the account.
      java.lang.String getOwner()
      Returns the public key of the account's owner.
      java.lang.String getRentEpoch()
      Returns the rent epoch for the account.
      long getSpace()
      Returns the amount of space, in bytes, allocated to the account.
      boolean isExecutable()
      Indicates whether the account is marked as executable.

    • Method Detail

      • getLamports

        long getLamports()
        Returns the number of lamports in the account. Lamports are the smallest unit of SOL, the native token of Solana.
        Returns:
        the account balance in lamports

      • getOwner

        java.lang.String getOwner()
        Returns the public key of the account's owner. The owner is responsible for executing programs on behalf of this account.
        Returns:
        the base58-encoded string representing the public key of the account's owner

      • getData

        AccountInfo.AccountInfoData getData()
        Retrieves the data associated with the account. This data includes both encoded and parsed representations of the account's information.
        Returns:
        an instance of AccountInfo.AccountInfoData containing the account's data

      • isExecutable

        boolean isExecutable()
        Indicates whether the account is marked as executable. If true, the account contains a program that can be executed on the Solana blockchain.
        Returns:
        true if the account is executable, false otherwise

      • getRentEpoch

        java.lang.String getRentEpoch()
        Returns the rent epoch for the account. The rent epoch is the epoch number at which the account will no longer be rent-exempt if its balance falls below the minimum required.
        Returns:
        the rent epoch number

      • getSpace

        long getSpace()
        Returns the amount of space, in bytes, allocated to the account. The space is used to store data for the account, and the size is determined by the program that owns the account.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes allocated for the account's data
